EmailTemplate.name: Agency Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Agent {!AccountContactRelation.Agent_Name__c} is requesting an association to your Agency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!AccountContactRelation.Main_Contact_Name__c} ,
{!Contact.Name} is requesting your approval for an association with your Agency {!Account.Name}. Please login to the {!Community. Url} and refer to your dashboard to confirm this.
If you have any questions, please contact rsa@cdfa.ca.gov.
Regards, RSA Administrator Division of Measurement Standards California Department of Food and Agriculture
